Class CarouselView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.view.View
      • android.view.ViewGroup
        • android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView
          • com.gtomato.android.ui.widget.CarouselView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.graphics.drawable.Drawable.Callback, android.view.accessibility.AccessibilityEventSource, android.view.KeyEvent.Callback, android.view.ViewManager, android.view.ViewParent

    public class CarouselView
extends android.support.v7.widget.RecyclerView
    Carousel View, the main class of the library.

      • isEnableFling

        public boolean isEnableFling()
        Returns whether enableFling is set.
        Returns:

      • setEnableFling

        public CarouselView setEnableFling(boolean enableFling)
        Set enableFling. If enableFling is false, scrolling stops once users' finger releases; otherwise, leave the scrolling behaviour as is.

        Default value: true

        Parameters:
        enableFling -
        Returns:
        this

      • isScrollingAlignToViews

        public boolean isScrollingAlignToViews()
        Returns whether scrollingAlignToViews is set.
        Returns:

      • setScrollingAlignToViews

        public CarouselView setScrollingAlignToViews(boolean scrollingAlignToViews)
        Set scrollingAlignToViews. If scrollingAlignToViews is true, the scrolling position will be "corrected" to the nearest integer position after a scrolling ends.

        Default value: true

        Parameters:
        scrollingAlignToViews -
        Returns:
        this

        public boolean isClickToScroll()
        Returns if clickToScroll is set.
        Returns:

      • setClickToScroll

        public CarouselView setClickToScroll(boolean clickToScroll)
        Set clickToScroll. If clickToScroll is true, this CarouselView will scroll to an item once it is clicked. Note that sometimes it may interfere with other touch events. Default value: true
        Parameters:
        clickToScroll -
        Returns:
        this
